description: Ms. composite codex. 1. fol. 1b-4a: [Risālah fī al-wujūd]. 2. fol. 4b-23a: [Asrār al-shahādah]. 3. fol. 23b-43b: [Blank]. 4. fol. 43b-114a: Risālah fī ḥaqīqat al-ajsām wa-al-ajsād wa-īḍāḥ kayfīyat al-maʻād. 5. fol. 114b-119a: [Blank pages and notes]. 6. fol. 119b-128b: Aḥvālāt-i khātim-i anbiyā Muḥammad Muṣṭafá va Amīr al-Muʾminīn va bāqī-yi aʾimmah. 7. fol. 129a-135a: [Blank]. 8. fol. 135b-154a: Kitāb-i Javāhirʹnāmah. Dated Jumādá al-Thānī 1261 H., Mashhad. 9. fol. 154a-156a: [Anecdote concerning Shāh ʻAbbās and the discovery of some mines]. Dated 1261 H. 10. fol. 156b-159a: [Blank]. 11. fol. 159b-175b: [Selections from Laṭāʾif al-ṭawāʾif] / Fakhr al-Dīn ʻAlī ibn Ḥusayn al-Wāʻiẓ al-Kāshifī al-mashhūr bi-al-Ṣafī. In Persian; incomplete.
extent: 175 leaves : paper ; 169 x 111 mm. bound to 174 x 114 mm.
title: [Arabic and Persian miscellany].
subject: Muḥammad, Prophet, d. 632—Biography
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
